articles.title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League reportedly delayed for a second time - TrueAchievements
articles.description: After a wave of negativity towards its live service elements, Warner Bros. has reportedly delayed the launch of Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League until later this year.
